name: Cyclops Quest
description:
Cyclops Quest is a short game made for the Jame Gam #11!

The Cyclop's have stolen all the colour from your world! Now YOU will have to get them back using you sick new magic GUN!

WASD to move, left button shoots and space to jump.You can do double jumps and and cling to the walls. The bullets ricochet and always follow the same order: Red, green, blue and yellow. Use these bullets to hit matching enemies. If you miss a shot or die, press R to restart the room, or Enter to restart the entire game.
